column5: Come stay in a charming old bungalow, close to all the action in downtown San Antonio! Fully renovated. Located in up and coming Government Hill, it's only a short ride from the airport. - Ft. Sam Houston military base /.5 miles 7min walk / 3min bike ride - Pearl Brewery /1.5 miles. 9min bike ride - Doesuem /2.2 miles from the house. 10min bike ride - The Alamo /2.5 miles  - Henry B. Convention center /2.9 miles. $7 Uber. - The Riverwalk /3 miles  - $15 Uber /8 miles from the airport.
